name: Home-A-Genius
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living Room”
”Alexa, set Study Room to 100%”
”Alexa, dim Study Room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Voice Control your home more naturally with Home-A-Genius Smart Home skill for Amazon Alexa.

Home-A-Genius integrates various smart home devices like philips hue lighting, yeelight and smart switches into a single platform. With this skill, turn on/off, change color or set brightness of smart lights in Home-A-Genius.

How it works?

Home-A-Genius Hub is required to use this skill.

1. Login to Amazon using Home-A-Genius Web App
2. Create an automation in Home-A-Genius Web App and click Save 
3. Add this skill to your Amazon Alexa and all smart devices connected to home-a-genius will automatically be synchronized to Amazon Alexa.
